revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road Hoenn |image = [[File:Victory Road Hoenn.png|250px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Victory Road Hoenn. |tokens = 37,000 |location = North of Ever Grande City. }} '''Victory Road Hoenn''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 560,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==

<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Kalos]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
